title: Gastown Beads Redesign Implementation
description:
Migrate Gas Town from custom bd file format to bd CLI as sole state management layer.

## Progress
- [x] Phase 1: bd CLI Wrappers (6 tasks) - DONE
- [x] Phase 2: Convoy Lifecycle Refactoring (5 tasks) - DONE
- [x] Phase 3: Respawn Mechanism (3 tasks) - DONE
- [x] Phase 4: Agent Definitions Update (5 tasks) - DONE
- [x] Phase 5: Deprecate Old bd Module (2 tasks) - DONE
- [x] Phase 6: Testing & Documentation (3 tasks) - DONE

All 21 tasks complete. 107 tests passing.

See: docs/plans/2026-01-08-gastown-beads-redesign-impl.md
close_reason: All 6 phases (21 tasks) complete. 107 tests passing.
